title: Drawing, "Dome and a Tower of St. Peter's Basilica, Rome, Italy", January 1869
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite at various locations:  2 / silvery / gold / pinky gold / greyer / grass / weed / bushe [s]; and at lower right: 2 edge coppery
Verso:  Inscribed at right: 2
description:
Recto:  Horizontal distant view of the done of St. Peter's Basilica shown from the Pincio Hill.  Trees are seen at left and at right in the foreground.

Verso: Horizontal view of the dome of St. Peter's Basilica and one of the towers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Dome and a Tower of St. Peter's Basilica, Rome, Italy", January 1869.
January 1869. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-156.
